item.title: Why I'm starting a blog...
item.description: Welcome to my new blog! I’m glad you’re here. The purpose of this blog is to capture interesting idea’s and/or solutions especially for myself to build a digital archive. But I might capture experiences or know things that are worth sharing with the world. I hope you’ll find it useful and interesting. I plan to write about a variety of topics, including: GitHub Azure DevOps Azure PowerShell Integrations Home Automation and more fun things that I encounter when I’m wandering of in the digital area!
